query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as total, 
  SUM(CASE WHEN chemical_class LIKE '%Herbicide%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as herbicides,
  SUM(CASE WHEN chemical_class LIKE '%Fungicide%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as fungicides,
  SUM(CASE WHEN chemical_class LIKE '%solvent%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as solvents,
  SUM(CASE WHEN chemical_class LIKE '%UV%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as uv_filters
FROM edc_chemicals;
